definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Julia Gillard (1961-), Australian politician, prime minister from 2010
pinyin: Zhu1 li4 ya3 · Ji2 la1 de2

sentences.english: 'China will continue to grow, and grow strongly, ' Ms. Gillard said.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德说，中国经济将继续增长，而且会非常强劲。

sentences.english: Everyone I know is happy Gilad will be free.
sentences.chinese: 我认识的所有人都很高兴吉拉德可以回来。

sentences.english: Ms. Gillard predicted Saturday's ballot will be an 'absolute cliffhanger.'
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德预测，周六的投票毫无疑问将“扣人心弦”。

sentences.english: Gillard's Apricot Kernels will be short-lived, with Rudd due to return to Artificial Turf late Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 但吉拉德的升职只是短暂的，陆克文周四晚就会回国。
吉拉德怀疑地摇了摇头。

sentences.english: Gillard"s elevation will be short-lived, with Rudd due to return to Australia late Thursday."
sentences.chinese: 但吉拉德的升职只是短暂的，陆克文周四晚就会回国。

sentences.english: Gillard was a party to every major decision of the Rudd government.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德参与了陆克文政府的每一项重要决定。

sentences.english: "This will be a close, hard-fought contest, " Ms Gillard told reporters.
sentences.chinese: “这将是一个紧密，硬打比赛，”她吉拉德对记者说。

sentences.english: Yes, please let him know I would like to discuss the Girard case with him.
sentences.chinese: 好的，请告诉我想和他讨论有关吉拉德的案子。

sentences.english: Fitz-Gerald believes gold prices will hit $2, 500 in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德认为近期黄金价格将达到2500美元。

sentences.english: Mr Latham aggressively confronted Ms Gillard during a public event in Brisbane.
sentences.chinese: 黎敦在积极面对在布里斯班公共事件女士吉拉德。

definition: Burns (name)/Nicholas Burns (1956-), US diplomat, Under-secretary at US State Department from 2005
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
